i1.name: Blade's_End
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Talon's''' [[champion ability|abilities]] apply a [[stack]] of ''Wound'' to enemy {{tip|champions}} and large {{tip|monsters}} each time they are hit. ''Wound'' lasts for 6 seconds, refreshing with basic attacks and subsequent hits, and stacks up to 3 times.

'''Talon's''' next {{tip|basic attack}} against an enemy with 3 ''Wound'' stacks will consume them all to cause the target to bleed, dealing{{ft|{{as|{{pp|75 to 245}}|physical damage}} {{as|(+ 200% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|'''total''' physical damage}} over 2 seconds,|{{as|{{pp|75/16 to 245/16|round=false}}|physical damage}} {{as|(+ {{fd|12.5}}% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|physical damage}} every {{fd|0.125}} seconds over 2 seconds,}}increased to 120% damage against {{tip|monsters}}. The target cannot gain stacks during this time.
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Talon's champion ability apply a stack of Wound to enemy champions and large monsters each time they are hit. Wound lasts for 6 seconds, refreshing with basic attacks and subsequent hits, and stacks up to 3 times.
Talon's next basic attack against an enemy with 3 Wound stacks will consume them all to cause the target to bleed, dealingincreased to 120% damage against monsters. The target cannot gain stacks during this time.
i1.notes:
* ''Blade End's'' enhanced attack will still trigger if {{tip|blocked}}.
* Both passes of {{ai|Rake|Talon}} and {{ai|Shadow Assault|Talon}} apply a stack of ''Wound''.
* {{Pending for test}}: Interaction with ''parrying'' effects ({{tip|dodge}}, {{tip|blind}}).
* {{tip|Spell shield}} prevents ''Wound'' [[stacks]] from being applied.
** {{tip|Spell shield}} prevents ''Blade End's'' enhanced attack from triggering though still consuming all ''Wound'' [[stacks]].

q1.name: Noxian_Diplomacy
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Talon''' {{tip|dashes}} towards the target enemy, dealing {{as|physical damage}} upon arrival. If ''Noxian Diplomacy'' is cast within close range, '''Talon''' instead stabs the target to {{tip|critically strike}} for {{as|{{critical damage|50|100}} '''bonus''' physical damage}}, as well as gain {{sti|75 '''bonus''' attack range}} on his next basic attack within 1 second.
If ''Noxian Diplomacy'' kills the target, '''Talon''' {{tip|heals}} for {{pp|9 to 55}} and {{sti|cdr|reduces}} the cooldown by 50%.
''Noxian Diplomacy's'' stab {{tip|basic attack reset|resets}} '''Talon's''' basic attack timer.
'''''Talon''' will attempt to basic attack the target afterwards.''
q1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Talon dashes towards the target enemy, dealing physical damage upon arrival. If Noxian Diplomacy is cast within close range, Talon instead stabs the target to critically strike for (+ IE 25%) bonus physical damage, as well as gain 75 bonus attack range on his next basic attack within 1 second.
If Noxian Diplomacy kills the target, Talon heals for 9 − 55 (based on level) and reduces the cooldown by 50%.
Noxian Diplomacy's stab resets Talon's basic attack timer.
Talon will attempt to basic attack the target afterwards.
q1.notes:
* '''Talon''' will track the target if they change locations.
** He will dash to the target's previous location while still dealing damage if the target is too far away or moves beyond {{tt|800|Estimated}} units.
* While {{tip|ground|grounded}} or {{tip|root|rooted}}, ''Noxian Diplomacy'' can only be cast within stab range.
* ''Noxian Diplomacy'' will also grant the heal if the target dies upon '''Talon's''' completion of the dash.
{{Unit-targeted cancel conditions}}** This only applies to the stab version.

w1.name: Rake
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Talon''' throws a fan of daggers in a cone in the target direction that deals {{as|physical damage}} to enemies hit.

At maximum range, the daggers linger for {{fd|0.75}} seconds before homing back to '''Talon''', dealing {{as|physical damage}} and {{tip|slow|slowing}} enemies hit for 1 second. Enemies can be hit only once per pass.
w1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Talon throws a fan of daggers in a cone in the target direction that deals physical damage to enemies hit.
At maximum range, the daggers linger for 0.75 seconds before homing back to Talon, dealing physical damage and slowing enemies hit for 1 second. Enemies can be hit only once per pass.
Rake deals 105% damage against monsters.
leveling:
{{st|Return Physical Damage|{{ap|50 to 170}} {{as|(+ 80% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Total Physical Damage|{{ap|40+50 to 80+170}} {{as|(+ {{ap|40+80}}% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
{{st|Slow|{{ap|40 to 60}}%}}
w1.notes:
* If '''Talon''' dies while ''Rake'' is mid-air, the projectiles will still complete their travel.
{{Effect at cast time end}}

effects.str:
• Return Physical Damage: (+ 80% bonus AD)
  • Total Physical Damage: (+ % bonus AD)
  • Slow: %

e1.name: Assassin's_Path
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Talon''' {{tip|dashes}} up to 800 units over the target area of [[terrain]], during which he gains {{tip|unobstructed vision}}.
'''Talon''' cannot cast ''Assassin's Path'' on the same area of terrain for a set duration.
e1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Talon dashes up to 800 units over the target area of terrain, during which he gains unobstructed vision.
Talon cannot cast Assassin's Path on the same area of terrain for a set duration.
e1.notes:
* ''Assassin's Path'' can interact with [[Terrain#Player-Generated|player-generated terrain]].
* '''Talon''' will stop dashing upon entering {{tip|stasis}} but will continue to do so afterwards.
e1.cooldown_warn: Wiki's and Riot's cooldowns do not match: Wiki's value '2' as '2' and riot's value '0,0,0,0,0' as '0'

r1.name: Shadow_Assault
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Talon''' disperses a ring of blades around him that deals {{as|physical damage}} to nearby enemies, and gains {{tip|invisibility}} and {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for up to {{fd|2.5}} seconds.
''Shadow Assault'' can be recast after 1 second within the duration, and does so automatically after the duration or if '''Talon''' emerges from invisibility.

{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Talon''' ends ''Shadow Assault'', breaking invisibility and converging the blades to him, dealing the same {{as|physical damage}} to enemies hit. Breaking invisibility with a basic attack or ''{{ai|Noxian Diplomacy|Talon}}'' causes the blades to converge to the target instead.
r1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Talon disperses a ring of blades around him that deals physical damage to nearby enemies, and gains invisibility and bonus movement speed for up to 2.5 seconds.
Shadow Assault can be recast after 1 second within the duration, and does so automatically after the duration or if Talon emerges from invisibility.
Recast: Talon ends Shadow Assault, breaking invisibility and converging the blades to him, dealing the same physical damage to enemies hit. Breaking invisibility with a basic attack or Talon's Noxian Diplomacy causes the blades to converge to the target instead.
leveling:
{{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|90 to 180}} {{as|(+ 100% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Total Physical Damage|{{ap|90*2 to 180*2}} {{as|(+ 200% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}<!--
-->{{st|Bonus Movement Speed|{{ap|40 to 70}}%}}
r1.notes:
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block a single pass.
* ''Shadow Assault'' does not cancel '''Talon's''' basic attacks.
* ''Shadow Assault'' has a minimum lifetime of 0.8 seconds before convergence.

effects.str:
• Physical Damage: (+ 100% bonus AD)
  • Total Physical Damage: (+ 200% bonus AD)
  • Bonus Movement Speed: %
